attributes.action: Reduce all Public Sector Pay by 10%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reduce all public sector pay by 10% for anyone paid over £25,000 pa. Put all public sector employees on notice who earn over 50,000 pa to be replaced with at least 2 positions.
As a nation we are being crippled by paying high wages to public sector employees who do are not accountable for their work performance.
